MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB460308844
Licensee Name: Catholic Charities of Jacksn, Lenw, & Hillsd
Licensee Address: 199 North Broad Street
Adrian, MI 49221
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 263-2191
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Suzanne Lewis, Designee
Name of Facility: Catholic Charities of Jackson, Lenawee &
Hillsdale
Facility Address: 123 E. Maumee St.
Adrian, MI 49221
Facility Telephone #: (517) 263-2191
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency requested approval of new office space. The address of the new office
location is 425 Ormsby St. Adrian, MI 49221.
III. Methodology
The on-site inspection of the new space was completed on 10/19/2020.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new offices are located in a building that used to be a school for the church
next door. The agency is leasing only the main floor of the building for the CPA
license. There is ample parking, two entry doors, and a separate elevator entrance
for handicap accessibility. The entries lead to an interior space that has a secured
door to the offices and visitation rooms. Guests will buzz in through the intercom
for security.
The space is situated along one corridor. There is a kitchen area and two large
visitation rooms on one side of the hall. The other side of the hall houses a large
room which will serve as multiple staff‘s office spaces. Within this large room is a
separate locked room, which will house files. The agency also has a crosscut
shredder for confidential documents. There are two separate supervisor offices
and another separate office for the director/Chief Administrator on this side of the
hall.
The space is assessed to be suitable for the CPA license.
V. Recommendation
I recommend approval of the new office space and no change to the current
license status. The new address will be reflected in upcoming reports after
processing.
October 23, 2020
________________________________________
Kari Muntean Date
Licensing Consultant
Approved by:
October 26, 2020

Claudia Triestram, Date
